This Week's Specials

  • Insalata di Casa
    A colorful and fresh mesclin mix salad with mozzarella cheese, artichoke hearts, peppers, and figs.
    About The Dish
  • Burrata
    The classic Italian dish; buffalo mozzarella topped with red peppers and a balsamic reduction. Served over greens.
    About The Dish
  • Linguini con le Vongole
    Served with either red or white sauce, this dish is the perfect combination of fresh home made pasta and sea food.
    About The Dish
  • Bisteca con Chimichurri
    A deliciously rib-eye steak with our famous chimichurry sauce served with fresh house made potato chips.
    About The Dish
  • Dulce de Leche Crepe
    A delicious sweetness topped with caramelized bananas.
    About the Dish
  • Mascarpone Zabligione
    The house signature dessert. A nutella spinoff of an Italian classic.
    About the Dish
